General.Name: Yuilrobotics Co. Ltd.
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: Yuil Robotics Co., Ltd., a robotics company, manufactures and sells collaborative, articulated, and orthogonal robots worldwide. It also offers Linkobot, an industrial robot. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Incheon, South Korea.
